ComicInfo.Summary:
A new Blade Runner series arrives in the first comic to tell original stories set in the Blade Runner universe!
In the new-noir city of Los Angeles, 2019, veteran Blade Runner Detective Ash has a new case, a billionaire's child, kidnapped by bioengineered Replicants…
From Oscar-nominated screenwriter Michael Green (Blade Runner 2049, Logan, American Gods, Supergirl), with longtime co-writer Mike Johnson (Batman/Superman, Star Trek) and illustrated by Andres Guinaldo (Justice League Dark, Captain America).
The first comic to tell original, in-canon stories set in the Blade Runner universe!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Artgerm | 1 | B | Cover B | Syd Mead | 2 | C | Cover C | Andres Guinaldo | 3 | D | Cover D | John Royale | 4 | E | Blank Cover E | None | 5 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Artgerm | Missing | RE | Forbidden Planet Exclusive Variant Cover | Ben Oliver | Missing | RE | Forbidden Planet Exclusive Variant Cover | Andres Guinaldo | Missing | LE | Limited Edition Comix Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Dan Quintana | Missing | RE | KRS Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Warren Louw | Missing | RE | The Comic Mint Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | John Gallagher | Missing |

ComicInfo.Genre: Fantasy, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha, Science Fiction, Action/Adventure, Movies & TV, Post-Apocalyptic
